word:
My peace was like a river, I seemed to be shut in 
                                                                           1099
with God, in sweet communion with him through my waking and sleeping hours. What high and holy privileges seemed to be mine in the love of Jesus, his life and his guardianship. How plainly the words were presented to my mind, "I am the resurrection, and the life: He that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die." Jesus lives to make intercession for us. Jesus lives, and because he lives, we shall live also."
